name: The Last Soldier
overview: The Last Soldier is a platform shooter game. The player's main goal is to turn on four reactors located in a secret Nazi bunker. The base is full of soldiers, mini tanks, rocket launchers, automatic turrets, laser beams and other deadly objects. The main character is equipped with an AK47 7.22MM Kalashnikov with limited ammo, which can be replenished by collecting boxes of ammunition scattered around the bunker. The player may also find medi-kits, pass keys, access codes, a gasoline canister and many other useful items that should be used in the appropriate place. A fall from a great height means a certain death.
